Text: Thank you for calling Triple-A bank.
My name is Arianna.
May I have your name?
James breed;
Oh hello Mr. Breed.
How can I make you smile today?
Why do I have fees on my bank account?
I want those removed.
Very ridiculous.
I can't even afford them.
Oh. I understand that fees are really costly.
Let me check your account to see what really happened.
Ok and remove the fees
I'll see what I can do Mr. Breed.
As I have checked you were charged some fees because you were not able to pay on time so that means we really cannot do anything about it anymore.
What do you mean you can't do anything?
You are supposed to help me.
Can you at least try to remove the fees?
No, no sir.
I can't do that because you did not make a payment.
If you just look at my account I made a payment but it was just a few hours late.
Can you at least consider?
I had to look for funds just to make a payment but I did my best to pay on my due date.
I was just late for the cutoff.
Can you please just remove at least one fee?
As much as I'd love to help you Mr. Breed, my hands are tied right now.
There's nothing I can do.
I already told you the reason and I'm afraid you'll have to pay the fees you'll have to pay the fees for now.
I want to let you know that you can actually avoid these fees by paying before 4 p.m. of your due date.
I already know that.
You already explained that.
You keep telling me the same thing but you're not doing anything.
I will make sure to call back and speak to your supervisor.
You are not helping me at all even though I've been a customer for five years!
Terrible service!
I'm really really really sorry sir.
No. You are not sorry.
Thank you for calling Triple-A bank.
My name is Maria.
May I have your name?
James breed;
Oh hello Mr. Breed.
How can I make you smile today?
Why do I have fees on my bank account?
I want those removed.
Very ridiculous.
I can't even afford them.
Oh. I understand that fees are really costly.

Ok.
And remove the fees.
I'll see what I can do Mr. Breed.
As I have checked, the account was charged some fees because there was no payment made before the cut off time of 4 p.m.
I made a payment.
I did my best to look for funds so I could pay on my due date.
It's just that it was done after 4 p.m.
I truly understand what you're going through Mr. Breed.
However, the fees charged were valid and therefore, the fees can no longer be refunded or removed.
Like I said I really did my best. Can you please remove even just one fee?
I really can't afford it.
Maybe you can make a consideration?
Please. Besides I made a payment on the due date itself.
I understand your concern sir and as much as I want to remove the fees, they really can no longer be removed.

However, since you requested, okay, I will send a request to the management and it's up to them to decide whatever course of action they will do after reviewing your account but this doesn't guarantee that the fees will be refunded.
Okay I understand that it's worth trying though.
Thank you for doing that.
You're welcome Mr. Breed.
I have already submitted a request and you will receive an email or text message after three days for the decision.
Thanks for trying.
Thank you for calling Shapes Reward.
My name is Mathilda.
Can I have your name please?
This is ELISA Collins
Hi Miss Collins.
How can I be of service?
I wanted to pay my bills using my rewards points but I can't log into your website.
What's happening?
Oh I'm so sorry for the inconvenience for the website.
May I know what error message you got?
Error message?
Where do I get that error message?
You mentioned you were trying to log in.
When you logged into shapes rewards website, can you please tell me what happened after?
Oh I just entered my username and my password and then when I clicked log in, the computer the screen.
What I'm seeing, it's the same.
It's loading and then it goes back to the login page so I can't get in and I need to use my rewards because I've saved them for so long now.
I understand Miss Collins.
Alright this what actually happened.
When you clicked log in and the screen or the page goes back to the exact same page after loading that means that the page is looping.
But what looping?
Is your website down?
Our website is actually up and running.
However, your browser has an issue.
Looping is when the browser page goes back to the same page again and again even though you've already taken action.
Just like in your case, you've clicked log in but it doesn't go to your profile on Shapes Rewards, right?
It just keeps going back to the login page but don't worry you've got the right person on the line to help you.
We just need to do quick troubleshooting on your browser.
Okay.
Great!
Are you using Mac or PC?
Windows.
Ok Windows PC is good.
May I know what browser you're using?
I'm not really sure.;
Is it Google Chrome or Firefox?
Oh it's Chrome.
Oh ok, that's great.
May I know the chrome version?
I am really sorry honey but I don't have any idea.
My granddaughter just gifted me this computer last Christmas and she's not here right now.
Oh that's ok Miss Collins.
I'll just give you instructions and we'll get through this.
Thank you honey.
So you said version?
Yes, can you please close the Chrome browser and open it again after?
Yes, done.
That's good.
Now that you have the browser open, do you see 3 dots that are aligned vertically on the upper right part of your screen?
Yes
Please click that and you will see a drop-down box.
Then look for the word help or about Google Chrome.
I do see help that about Google Chrome.
I clicked it.
Oh it's version 68 and a couple random numbers.
Wow thank you.
Looks like you have the most updated browser versions so far.
So, the next thing, we will do is clear cache from your browser.
This will not affect your stored files or anything on your computer.

It's just that most of the time the information that you click out to the Internet gets saved in a cache memory or storage in your browser and this eventually results to latency or what you just experienced.
Oh this is all so new to me.
But you don't have to worry because once you do this once it's easier to do this again next time if it happens again.
So just click those three dots that you clicked earlier and look for more tools.
Did you see it?
Ok.
Then you will see clear browsing data.
Okay I see basic and advanced.
Alright, we are on the right track.
We can just go to the basic part and make sure you check all the checkboxes for the browsing history cookies and cached images.
Ok, done it.
Then, if you see the time range you can choose all time.
Then just click clear data.
Okay, it's loading.
Yes yes that's normal.
So once it's done loading, you will be on the same page.
So, just press f5 on your keyboard to let it refresh and then you can start logging in again.
Ok I will try again.
Ok, let me know what happens.
Oh, I can login now.
I'm so happy.
I am so happy for you too Miss Collins and it has been my pleasure to assist you.
Did I address all your concerns today?
Very much, thank you.
You're welcome.
Thanks for calling Shapes Rewards and enjoy your day.

Let me check your transactions for you real quick.
I see that the last transaction made was using your debit card at Target for 179 54, 179 dollars and 54 cents.
Yes, This just posted today.
Is this valid?
Oh yes, that's mine.
I did that yesterday and it just posted recently here.
Your debit card is safe, no unauthorized transaction so I'm closing it now tagging is as lost.
Would you like a replacement over the phone?
It's free of charge.
Sure, how long will it take?
It will be delivered in 10 business days and while you're waiting for your new card, you may go to any branch to do an over to counter withdrawal.
Just bring two valid IDs.
That's fair enough.

Your new debit card will have a new card number but the account number and PIN will remain the same.
Just call us right away once you receive it so that we can activate it for you and everything's good.
The replacement has been processed and have I address all your concerns?
Yes yes, you did.
Thanks so much for your help.
My pleasure and thank you for calling Grand Number One.
Enjoy the rest of your day.
It's a great day here at our hotel I'm Rebecca.
How can I assist you?
Hi Rebecca.
I'm wondering if you can reserve me a room.
My friends and I are staying for a trip.
I'll be happy to check that for you.
May I have your name?
Pauline Soupe.
Thank You Pauline
How many of your friends are staying?
Two, so there are three of us.

One room.
Alright, let me check if you have an available room for what days?
September 5 to 7
Thank you, so, there is one available premium room that is good for three people with three separate beds.
It comes with free Wi-Fi cable channels, minibar and mini kitchens.
That's 99 dollars per night.
Okay.
There's also a deluxe room available that has the same amenities as premier except that it has its own swimming pool.
That costs $150 per night.
Which one you prefer?
Oh well we're just staying to sleep in so I'll take the premier.

Yes there's free breakfast.

Yes, please.
May I have the names of the guests?
Pauline Sue and my friends Andrea Smith and Alexis Washington
Great, so you will check in on September 5 at 2 p.m. and check out on September 7 12 noon.
So that's 2 nights for $198 and we have to add the taxes, so the total amount is 217 dollars and 56 cents.
Thank you, so should I pay now or what?
That's right, you should.
Yes, you should actually pay now.
Alright, so just to recap I have already reserved the premier room for you for two nights on September 5 to 7 with total cost two hundred and seventeen dollars and 56 cents.
This is actually considered booked.
If you decide to cancel within 15 days before your check-in date, there will be no cancellation fee and the money will be refunded to you in 10 business days.
But, if you can so within three days before your check-in date, half of the total amount will be forfeited, while, if you cancel within 24 hours before check-in the total amount will be forfeited.
Do you have any other questions Pauline?
No, that sounds great.
You're welcome.
Thanks for calling our hotel.
We look forward to your enjoyable stay.
Bye.

Sorry, you are always sorry, but you're not doing anything!

You have to fix this now, fix this now!

Unfortunately when you pay through that affiliated center, it takes about 2 to 3 business days more to complete the payment processing.

So the connection has been cut off, but.

You guys told me I could pay at affiliated centers and that's what I did and now I'm at fault.
Now, I can't continue with my online job because of you or actually because of me?
That's ridiculous!
I am really sorry, Miss America.
I understand your situation is very tough right now.
Really, huh?
But, what I can do is to open a ticket or submit a report so that the other department assigned can manually complete your payment and reconnect your internet.
I just need the payment ID number ma'am and which center did you make the payment?
Why do you have to ask for that?
You just said so yourself you've seen my payment as pending?
Yeah, and just want to verify it.
At the Strawberry Mall, my payment ID. Hold on a second. One one one two eight five six nine seven four.
Thanks so much for your patience, Miss America.
I'm going to submit the report
Please just stay on the line for a minute, Ma'am.
I'm done with the report, please expect to have your connection reinstated within 24 hours.
We will send you a text message as well to your phone number and file.
Within 24 hours?
Can you make it faster than that?
As much as I'd love to that has been a turnaround time for reconnection since then, so to give enough time for the team to manually complete the payment.
Okay fine, as if I have a choice.
Again, I'm really sorry.
Is there anything else?
Nothing, just make sure you reconnect my line as soon as possible.
Bye, yes, ma'am.
